TestCase.name: testOrderByFetch
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a, b desc FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], select=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testOrderByLimit
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM MyTable ORDER BY a, b desc LIMIT 10

LogicalSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC-nulls-first], dir1=[DESC-nulls-last], fetch=[10]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[], orderBy=[a ASC, b DESC], select=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[single], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopN2
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, c, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE 10 >= rank_num

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>=(10, $3)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b DESC], select=[a, b, c, rk], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopN
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, c, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num <= 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[<=($3, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b DESC], select=[a, b, c, rk], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNWithFilter
TestCase.Resource: SELECT rank_num, a, c FROM ( SELECT a, b, c, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable WHERE c > 1000) WHERE rank_num <= 10 AND b IS NOT NULL

LogicalProject(rank_num=[$3], a=[$0], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(<=($3, 10), IS NOT NULL($1))]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>($2, 1000)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Calc(select=[w0$o0 AS rank_num, a, c], where=[IS NOT NULL(b)], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=1, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b DESC], select=[a, b, c, rk], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[>(c, 1000)], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testTopNth
TestCase.Resource: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a, b, c, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b DESC) as rank_num FROM MyTable) WHERE rank_num = 10

LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($3, 10)]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], rank_num=[ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY $0 ORDER BY $1 DESC NULLS LAST ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]])

Rank(strategy=[AppendFastRank], rankFunction=[ROW_NUMBER], rankRange=[rankStart=10, rankEnd=10], partitionBy=[a], orderBy=[b DESC], select=[a, b, c, rk], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- Exchange(distribution=[hash[a]], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[MyTable, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]], fields=[a, b, c], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc])
